verbs.description: [V: Appearing] [ARGM-LOC: on MSNBC Live With Velshi & Ruhle] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [ARGM-PRP: to promote his new book , Us vs. Them : The Failure of Globalism] , foreign policy expert and Eurasia Group President Ian Bremmer , a frequent critic of President Trump , went out of his way to credit the President for the major diplomatic breakthrough with North Korea . He even admonished those refusing to give credit where
